title: Bug 6191Should be able to select contents of string
description: Bug 6191Should be able to select contents of string In a previous version of Eclipse, and in VAJ, and in VAME, I could doubleclickinside a Java string and select the whole string. This is handy for replacingthe text in the string. It should selectbetween "s as well. Try it in VAJ or VAME to see what I mean.
OB: For example, if you have a string"This is a pretty long string and it is incorrect"then you could doubleclick in between the first " and the Tor after the last t and before the end "and the whole string would be selected.Currently, doubleclick only selects between brackets.
